definition: at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning

sentences.english: Roosevelt, avid for war, undertook a desperate gamble.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯福，渴望战争，他就此孤注一掷。

sentences.english: Three is afraid of in some way yet but would have died, free grudge.
sentences.chinese: 三是怕某些心愿尚未了却便就此撒手西去，空余遗恨。

sentences.english: You've done enough, you may stop there.
sentences.chinese: 你已经做得很够了，可以就此打住。
石原知事很快便就此道歉。

sentences.english: The Chinese side also presented an official note on the matter to the U.S. side.
sentences.chinese: 中方还就此向美方递交了正式照会。

sentences.english: I just thought I'd mention it.
sentences.chinese: 就此为止，我刚想起我曾提过的。

sentences.english: Inman tong-held embarked on a long dangerous way home.
sentences.chinese: 英曼就此踏上了漫长艰险的回家路。

sentences.english: Stay young forever, Yoga, Its time to stop.
sentences.chinese: 青春不老，瑜伽，让时间就此驻留。

sentences.english: We caught up with a variety of lawyers and legal academics on the deal.
sentences.chinese: 我们就此协议联系了许多律师和法学家。

sentences.english: If you want to walk out of here, you'll go through me, you got it?
sentences.chinese: 你若从这走出去，你我就此恩断义绝，你听懂了吗？

sentences.english: The Sulzberger family has had control of the “newspaper of record” ever since.
sentences.chinese: 该家族就此成了掌控报业的世家。

sentences.english: The afternoon could have ended in mere tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 那天下午本应仅以一场悲剧就此结束。

sentences.english: I'm very suspicious that actually Archimedes had been thinking about that problem for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 我猜测，阿基米德实际上已经就此思考了很长时间。

sentences.english: And the heart health benefits of sex don't end there.
sentences.chinese: 性行为对心脏健康的好处并未就此结束。

sentences.english: This paper carried on the preliminary discussion on this question taking linfen as an example.
sentences.chinese: 本文以临汾市为例，就此问题进行了初步探讨。

sentences.english: Excuse me while I pack for California.
sentences.chinese: 我要整理行装前往加利福尼亚，不好意思就此打住。

definition: to stop at this point/to end here/to call it a day
to rush to conclude a matter/to end up abruptly
end/conclusion/to come to an end/to terminate (sth)
